snippet: Alamo Drafthouse Cinema, the Texas-based movie theater chain famed for its no-tolerance policy on cell phone use, will move into Metro Theater at Broadway and 99th Street, which opened in 1933 as the Midtown Theater, and closed in 2005. The new...
abstract: Alamo Drafthouse Cinema, the Texas-based movie theater chain famed for its no-tolerance policy on cell phone use, will move into Metro Theater at Broadway and 99th Street, which opened in 1933 as the Midtown Theater, and closed in 2005. The new theater is scheduled to open in 2013.

headline.main: Texas Chain to Reincarnate a Landmark Theater
